title: Markets, Healthcare, And The Supply Chain
itunes:title: Markets, Healthcare, And The Supply Chain
description:
Katie Nixon, CIO of Wealth Management at Northern Trust, discusses inflation risks and interest rates in 2022. Waqaas Al-Siddiq, CEO of Biotricity, talks about what he believes will be the post-pandemic “new normal” when it comes to healthcare delivery. Gene Seroka, Executive Director of the Port of LA, has the latest on supply chain bottlenecks and labor. Jill Garvey, Senior VP and Senior Wealth Strategist at Huntington National Bank, gives her market outlook for 2022. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
